PT_HOST=logs7.papertrailapp.com

PT_PORT=17221

cat logging/fluentd-papertrail.yml | sed -e "s@NNNNN@$PT_PORT@g" \
    | sed -e "s@logsN.papertrailapp.com@$PT_HOST@g" \
    | kubectl apply -f -

kubectl -n logging rollout status ds fluentd-papertrail
